channel.title: BloodbathPK [ PI ]
channel.description:
[center][center][img]http://s13.postimg.org/mmli01mgn/logo.png[/img] [size=18pt][font=impact]Goals:[/font][/size] Fixing ALL Dupes Adding 2 PK Shops with PK Points. [color=green]Fixing Depisot ALL lagg button[/color] Changing normal Starter to Advanced Starter Fixing G maul spec [color=green]Adding Special Recover Potion[/color] [color=green]Adding Master Command for normal Players[/color] [color=green]Adding Empty Command for normal players [/color]Adding Reset ( Attack, Strength, Defence, Magic, Ranging, Pray, HP,) commands [color=green]Adding GetID command[/color] Adding Donator Place ( With monsters that can dropping a rare, And shops ) Increasing Command list for all ranks. Adding daily events Adding statues that you can exchange for PKPoints Adding PvP dropping system Adding Control Panel for Hoster [color=green]Adding auto North if click on it[/color] [color=green]Adding Insant Switching for PK ( Fixing the Dupe to )[/color] Adding Spawn Quest Tab with Sets,Food,Potions,Rune's,) Adding Item Command for normal Players Adding unspawnable items for the command Item Adding Super Donator place and rang Changing Standard Source things Finishing Client
ORANGE = Working on GREEN = Done RED = Not Started Yet ______________________________________________________
[size=24pt]INFORMATION:[/size]
The source without this goals is [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=495620.0]TorvaPKZ[/url] Project Insanity Based source ______________________________________________________________ [size=24pt]RELEASE ( SOURCE/CLIENT):[/size] Source: [b]Not Finished[/b] Client: [b]Not Finished[/b] ___________________________________________________________________

item.title: BloodbathPK [ PI ]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Everyone has to start somewhere, good luck.

I suggest you get a book on java basics (there’s hundreds of free ebooks) and have a skim through it. Once you have a good base knowledge you’ll start to fix issues without tutorials with ease, believe it or not after you have a basic knowledge in a programming language the code comes easy. The design patterns and efficiency however, that’s the ball buster.

Read full topic

item.title: BloodbathPK [ PI ]
item.dc:creator: @soswen010 soswen010
item.description:
@soswen010 wrote:

[center][center]
[size=18pt][font=impact]Goals:[/font][/size]
Fixing ALL Dupes
Adding 2 PK Shops with PK Points.
[color=green]Fixing Depisot ALL lagg button[/color]
Changing normal Starter to Advanced Starter
Fixing G maul spec
[color=green]Adding Special Recover Potion[/color]
[color=green]Adding Master Command for normal Players[/color]
[color=green]Adding Empty Command for normal players
[/color]Adding Reset ( Attack, Strength, Defence, Magic, Ranging, Pray, HP,) commands
[color=green]Adding GetID command[/color]
Adding Donator Place ( With monsters that can dropping a rare, And shops )
Increasing Command list for all ranks.
Adding daily events
Adding statues that you can exchange for PKPoints
Adding PvP dropping system
Adding Control Panel for Hoster
[color=green]Adding auto North if click on it[/color]
[color=green]Adding Insant Switching for PK ( Fixing the Dupe to )[/color]
Adding Spawn Quest Tab with Sets,Food,Potions,Rune’s,)
Adding Item Command for normal Players
Adding unspawnable items for the command Item
Adding Super Donator place and rang
Changing Standard Source things
Finishing Client

ORANGE = Working on
GREEN = Done
RED = Not Started Yet
